title: ‘Careless John Lewis delivery man wrecked my ceiling with new mattress’
text:
Has a company treated you unfairly? Our consumer champion, Katie Morley, is here to help. For how to contact her click here.

Dear Katie,

I can’t get John Lewis to put right damage to my home that was caused by a careless delivery man. While bringing a new mattress up my stairs he ripped a chunk out of my ceiling.

I have tried to escalate my complaint but it hasn’t worked. It’s now over two and a half weeks since it sent someone to look at the damage. As I sit here, the plaster is continuing to crumble from my ceiling.

RD, Essex

Dear RD,
